it.polimi.se2018.model

Class PubOCColorDet

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.model.PubObjCard
      • it.polimi.se2018.model.PubOCColorDet

  • public class PubOCColorDet
extends PubObjCard
    This class consists of only one public method (other than the constructor) used to calculate the score of one Player according to the one specified onto the active Public Cards.
    Author:
    Federico Ferri, Alessio Fiorentino, Simone Francavilla

    • Constructor Detail

      • PubOCColorDet

        public PubOCColorDet(java.lang.String desc,
                     java.lang.String name,
                     boolean row,
                     boolean column,
                     boolean diagonal,
                     int multiplier)
        This is the constructor method of the class
        Parameters:
        desc - it is simply the description of the public card
        row - triggers on or off the public card that calculates the score of different colors by row
        column - triggers on or off the public card that calculates the score of different colors by column
        diagonal - triggers on or off the public card that calculates the score of different colors by diagonals

    • Method Detail

      • updateCheck

        private void updateCheck(int row,
                         int col,
                         WindowFrame wf)
        This method is used to "fill" an ArrayList that will count which Die Color appears on a specific Cell
        Parameters:
        row - this parameter is the row in which the cell is in
        col - this parameter is the column in which the cell is in
        wf - here the WindowFrame of the specific Player is sent to the method, in this way we can find out how the dice are placed onto the WindowFrame

      • getScoreRows

        private int getScoreRows(WindowFrame wf)
        This method calculates how many rows have no repetition of color
        Parameters:
        wf - This is the WindowFrame on which is the calculation is needed
        Returns:
        Returns the number of rows with no repetition of color

      • getScoreCol

        private int getScoreCol(WindowFrame wf)
        This method calculates how many columns have no repetition of color
        Parameters:
        wf - This is the WindowFrame on which is the calculation is needed
        Returns:
        Returns the number of column with no repetition of color

      • getScoreDiag

        private int getScoreDiag(WindowFrame wf)
        This method calculates how many diagonals have the same color
        Parameters:
        wf - This is the WindowFrame on which is the calculation is needed
        Returns:
        returns the number of dice that are the same color on a diagonal line

      • calculateScore

        public int calculateScore(WindowFrame wf)
        This method is used to calculate the score of a specific player throughout his WindowFrame inside it there are if statements that can be triggered on or off by the attributes of the class
        Specified by:
        calculateScore in class PubObjCard
        Parameters:
        wf - It is used to pass the Player's WireFrame on which the with dice are on
        Returns:
        score this method returns the score that a player made with the public card
